Text: Never mind just double click on the Icon that says registration (Registry Icon) after you have installed it and click yes.

nope doesn't work for myspace. 
also makes you install an unverifed driver
and a registery key manually.... i keep a backup of my reg file so just swapped them out after the uninstall.   norton 360 did NOT pickup any virus  so this is clean/difficult....

Summarily....a great software! The registry key is safe, you can open to view the code, it only registers a user for the application. Apart from that I encountered certain problems while actually trying to record system sound. But it was settled by disabling certain audio devices and properly setting
